duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide strong leadership in IT projects, overseeing the implementation and maintenance of ServiceNow and Salesforce systems.
Utilize Agile and Jira to support IT operations, ensuring efficient and effective project management.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand business needs and translate them into IT solutions.
Troubleshoot and resolve issues with ServiceNow and Salesforce platforms, providing technical support and guidance.
Stay updated with the latest IT trends and best practices, contributing to the continuous improvement of IT services and systems.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field (Master's preferred)
